thread.title: Straight up: Frank Piasecki's flying machine
thread.title_full: Straight up: Frank Piasecki's flying machine

author: eTN Editor
title: Straight up: Frank Piasecki's flying machine
text:
Straight up: Frank Piasecki's flying machine 
Boeing is turning 100 years young! 
Since July 15, 1916, Boeing has been making the impossible, possible. From producing a single canvas-and-wood airplane to transforming how they fly us over oceans and into the stars, The Boeing Company has become the world's largest aerospace company. Boeings website boast "we're just getting started." 
In the coming year Boeing invites you to join in the festivities with events, activities and commemorations that celebrate not only our first century of innovation but also the people and moments that inspire us to live by founder Bill Boeing’s philosophy -- “build something better.” Oct 22, 2015
